EmailTemplate.name: PS GSL1 PRM Incident EN
EmailTemplate.subject: PRM Incident: {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.PS_Escalated_To_Name__c},
Please process the following Partner-related request based on the details below:
PRM-Incident
Request for investigation of an unknown issue
Organization Name (NAM)
sCRM Account Name
ALCR ID / 1*
SAP ID / 2*
Account ID / 3*
Company Email Domain
Partner User Name
Partner User Email
sCRM User Create Status
sCRM Profile
sCRM Last Login
Support Portal Approval Status
Support Portal User Type
NAM User Status
NAM User Type
URL Used
URL of Error
Browser
CARES Status
Snapshots
Issue Description
HCL Related Ticket
Additional Notes
Once completed, please revert with the confirmation.
If additional information is needed, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at partner.support@nokia.com.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Partner Support Desk Email: partner.support@nokia.com
Partner Portal
Copyright 2020 Nokia
Thread Id: {{!Case.Thread_Id}}
